languages.text: "Как-то раз мы с братьями схлестнулись с оравой орков. И на пятый день сечи насадил брат Харад одного упитанного мерзавца на цепной меч, а тот взял и застрял! А сеча-то идет. Так Харад и рубился с тушей на мече. За то мы его прозвали Харад Пронзительный!"

"Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"
languages.original_text: "Как-то раз мы с братьями схлестнулись с оравой орков. И на пятый день сечи насадил брат Харад одного упитанного мерзавца на цепной меч, а тот взял и застрял! А сеча-то идет. Так Харад и рубился с тушей на мече. За то мы его прозвали Харад Пронзительный!"

traits.locale_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one meaty bastard with his chainsword — and got the sword stuck! But the fight was still raging on around him. So Harad just kept swinging his sword with the carcass still impaled on it. And that is how he got his moniker, Harad the Harpooner!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one meaty bastard with his chainsword — and got the sword stuck! But the fight was still raging on around him. So Harad just kept swinging his sword with the carcass still impaled on it. And that is how he got his moniker, Harad the Harpooner!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad the Harpooner!"

The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Un jour, ma meute et moi nous sommes trouvés aux prises avec une bande d'Orks. Le cinquième jour du combat, le frère Harad a tué l'un de ces tas de viande en le transperçant de son épée tronçonneuse, mais il n'a pas réussi à la retirer ! Comme la bataille faisait toujours rage, il a simplement continué à se battre avec le cadavre empalé sur son épée ! C'est cette histoire qui lui a valu son surnom d'Harad le Barbelé ! »
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, ma meute et moi nous sommes trouvés aux prises avec une bande d'Orks. Le cinquième jour du combat, le frère Harad a tué l'un de ces tas de viande en le transperçant de son épée tronçonneuse, mais il n'a pas réussi à la retirer ! Comme la bataille faisait toujours rage, il a simplement continué à se battre avec le cadavre empalé sur son épée ! C'est cette histoire qui lui a valu son surnom d'Harad le Harponneur ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, ma meute et moi nous sommes trouvés aux prises avec une bande d'Orks. Le cinquième jour du combat, le frère Harad a tué l'un de ces tas de viande en le transperçant de son épée tronçonneuse, mais il n'a pas réussi à la retirer ! Comme la bataille faisait toujours rage, il a simplement continué à se battre avec le cadavre empalé sur son épée ! C'est cette histoire qui lui a valu son surnom d'Harad le Barbelé ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «En una ocasión, mis hermanos y yo nos enfrentamos a una horda de Orkos. En el quinto día de la contienda, el hermano Harad ensartó a uno de los desgraciados con su espada sierra, pero ¡se quedó atascada en su cuerpo! El combate continuaba a su alrededor, de modo que Harad decidió seguir usando la espada... ¡con el cuerpo empalado en ella! Así es como consiguió su apodo: ¡Harad Barbaserrada!».
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: «En una ocasión, mis hermanos y yo nos enfrentamos a una horda de Orkos. En el quinto día de la contienda, el hermano Harad ensartó a uno de los desgraciados con su espada sierra, pero ¡se quedó atascada en su cuerpo! El combate continuaba a su alrededor, de modo que Harad decidió seguir usando la espada... ¡con el cuerpo empalado en ella! Así es como consiguió su apodo: ¡Harad el Arponero!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: «En una ocasión, mis hermanos y yo nos enfrentamos a una horda de Orkos. En el quinto día de la contienda, el hermano Harad ensartó a uno de los desgraciados con su espada sierra, pero ¡se quedó atascada en su cuerpo! El combate continuaba a su alrededor, de modo que Harad decidió seguir usando la espada... ¡con el cuerpo empalado en ella! Así es como consiguió su apodo: ¡Harad Barbaserrada!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “有一次，我和我的兄弟们和一群兽人打了起来。打到第五天的时候，我的兄弟哈拉德用链锯剑砍死了一个胖家伙，结果他的链锯剑卡在了肉里！可战斗还没结束，于是哈拉德只好继续挥舞链锯剑，连着卡在上面的尸体一起挥！他的绰号‘钩牙哈拉德’就是这么来的！”
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: “有一次，我和我的兄弟们和一群兽人打了起来。打到第五天的时候，我的兄弟哈拉德用链锯剑砍死了一个胖家伙，结果他的链锯剑卡在了肉里！可战斗还在继续，于是哈拉德只好继续挥舞手中的链锯剑，连着卡在上面的尸体一起挥起来！他的绰号‘鱼叉手哈拉德’就是这么来的！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: “有一次，我和我的兄弟们和一群兽人打了起来。打到第五天的时候，我的兄弟哈拉德用链锯剑砍死了一个胖家伙，结果他的链锯剑卡在了肉里！可战斗还在继续，于是哈拉德只好继续挥舞手中的链锯剑，连着卡在上面的尸体一起挥起来！他的绰号‘鱼叉手哈拉德’就是这么来的！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「かつて私と兄弟たちは、オークの群れと激突した。戦いが始まって5日目、ブラザー・ハラドはチェーンソードで肉付きのいい野郎の一人を串刺しにしたんだ！彼の剣は刺さったまま！戦いはまだ彼の周りで続いていたので、ハラドはただ剣を振り続けた。遺体も一緒にね。こうして彼は『ハラド・バーブファング』と呼ばれるようになったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: 「かつて私と兄弟たちは、オークの群れと激突した。戦いが始まって5日目、ブラザー・ハラドはチェーンソードで肉付きのいい野郎の一人を串刺しにしたんだ！彼の剣は刺さったまま！戦いはまだ彼の周りで続いていたので、ハラドはただ剣を振り続けた。遺体も一緒にね。こうして彼は『銛打ちのハラド』と呼ばれるようになったんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: 「かつて私と兄弟たちは、オークの群れと激突した。戦いが始まって5日目、ブラザー・ハラドはチェーンソードで肉付きのいい野郎の一人を串刺しにしたんだ！彼の剣は刺さったまま！戦いはまだ彼の周りで続いていたので、ハラドはただ剣を振り続けた。遺体も一緒にね。こうして彼は『銛打ちのハラド』と呼ばれるようになったんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Einst kämpften meine Brüder und ich gegen ein Rudel Orks. Am fünften Tag der Schlacht spießte Bruder Harad einen der fleischigen Bastarde mit seinem Kettenschwert auf — und sein Schwert blieb stecken! Der Kampf tobte um ihn herum weiter, also schwang Harad auch sein Schwert einfach weiter — und den darauf aufgespießten Leichnam einfach mit! Und so bekam er seinen Beinamen, Harad Hakenzahn!"
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"

traits.locale_text: "Einst kämpften meine Brüder und ich gegen ein Rudel Orks. Am fünften Tag der Schlacht spießte Bruder Harad einen der fleischigen Bastarde mit seinem Kettenschwert auf — und sein Schwert blieb stecken! Der Kampf tobte um ihn herum weiter, also schwang Harad auch sein Schwert einfach weiter — und den darauf aufgespießten Leichnam einfach mit! Und so bekam er seinen Beinamen, Harad der Harpunist!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Einst kämpften meine Brüder und ich gegen ein Rudel Orks. Am fünften Tag der Schlacht spießte Bruder Harad einen der fleischigen Bastarde mit seinem Kettenschwert auf — und sein Schwert blieb stecken! Der Kampf tobte um ihn herum weiter, also schwang Harad auch sein Schwert einfach weiter — und den darauf aufgespießten Leichnam einfach mit! Und so bekam er seinen Beinamen, Harad der Harpunist!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bir keresinde kardeşlerim ve ben, bir Ork güruhuyla çarpışıyorduk. Kavganın beşinci gününde kardeşim Harad, motorlu kılıcıyla o etli şerefsizlerden birini şişledi ve silahı sıkıştı! Çatışma hâlâ devam ediyordu, o yüzden Harad da kılıcını sallamaya devam etti. Şişlenmiş cesetle birlikte! Harad Barbardişleyen lakabını bu şekilde aldı!"
languages.original_text: "Once, my brothers and I clashed with a throng of Orks. On the fifth day of the fray, Brother Harad skewered one of the meaty bastards with his chainsword — and his sword got stuck! The fight still raged on around him, so Harad just kept swinging his sword — and the impaled corpse along with it! And that is how he got his moniker, Harad Barbfang!"
